title: TNPSC Group 4 Services: Certificate Verification & Counselling
image_desc:
The Tamil Nadu Public Service Commission (TNPSC) logo. Type: logo

### Video Suggestion:
A stock footage video showing the TNPSC office building in Chennai.
video_desc: A stock footage video showing the TNPSC office building in Chennai.
narration: Welcome to this presentation outlining the details for the TNPSC Group 4 Services Certificate Verification and Counselling process

title: Important Dates & Details
content:
Certificate Verification & Counselling: January 22nd - March 12th, 2025
Excluding Government Holidays: February 6th, 7th, 18th, 19th, 20th & March 7th
Location: TNPSC Office, Chennai
Check Eligibility: tnpsc.gov.in
image_desc:
A calendar highlighting the dates from January 22nd to March 12th, 2025, with the government holidays marked. Type: image

### Video Suggestion:
[No video suggestion needed]
narration: The Physical Certificate Verification and Counselling for TNPSC Group 4 services will be held from January twentysecond to March twelfth two thousand and twentyfive  Please note that this excludes several government holidays in February and March which are listed on the slide The verification will take place at the TNPSC office in Chennai You can check your eligibility on the official TNPSC website tnpscgovin

title: How to Check Your Eligibility
content:
Visit the TNPSC website: tnpsc.gov.in
Search for your Registration Number
Confirmation of Eligibility
Scheduled Date & Time via Website, SMS, or Email (No postal communication)
image_desc:
A screenshot of the TNPSC website homepage showing the relevant section for Group 4 results. Type: screenshot

### Video Suggestion:
[No video suggestion needed]
narration: To check your eligibility visit the TNPSC website at tnpscgovin  You can search for your registration number to confirm your eligibility  The commission will inform you of your scheduled date and time for verification through the website SMS or email  Please note that no individual communication will be sent by post

title: Important Considerations
content:
**Column 1:  Before Verification**
Download Memorandum of Admission from tnpsc.gov.in
Gather all necessary documents
**Column 2:  Important Notes**
Admission is purely provisional
Subject to document verification
Dependent on vacancies, rank, and successful completion of all stages
image_desc:
[No image needed]

### Video Suggestion:
[No video suggestion needed]
narration: Before attending the verification download your Memorandum of Admission from the TNPSC website  Make sure you have all the necessary documents ready Remember that admission is purely provisional and is subject to document verification  Your final selection will depend on available vacancies your rank and the successful completion of all stages of the selection process  Failure to attend on the scheduled date and time will result in disqualification
